channel.description: Recent content in User Interface on Industrial Revolution Documentation

item.title: Game Menu Panel
item.description: The Game Menu panel shows the basic game control functions like exiting the game. It is an UI element of the Map Scene. It is a modal UI element and by default it is not visible. The panel has the following functions: Button to close the Game Menu panel (“back to game”) Button to save the game Button to go to the Main Menu scene Button to exit the game

item.title: Ledger Panel
item.description: The Ledger panel shows information for about several game systems. It is an UI element of the Map Scene. It is a modal UI element and by default it is not visible. The ledger contains the following pages: List of Settlements . Providing an overview of all settlements with following information: Name of settlement Population count List of Markets . Name of market (in most cases name of settlement) Sub-list with prices of all resources at market Other components of the Ledger panel:

item.title: Main Panel
item.description: The Main Panel is an UI element of the Map Scene. It is always visible. It has the following functions: Label with current date Buttons for time control: Button to slow time Button to pause time Button to accelerate time Button to open the Ledger panel Button to open the Game Menu panel

item.title: National Stocks Panel
item.description: The National Stocks panel shows the resources currently stockpiled in the National Stocks . It is an UI element of the Map Scene. It is always visible.
